General.Name: Tangrenshen Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Tangrenshen Group Co., Ltd engages in the producing, processing, breeding, slaughtering, and selling of pig meat and feed products in China. The company sells its products under the Tangrenshen, Meishen, and Camel brand names. Tangrenshen Group Co., Ltd was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Zhuzhou, China.

3.Name: Mr. Shuang Sheng  Sun
3.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors & Non Independent Director
